claim(address).details: Sends the contract funds to the researcher that proved the contract is broken.

createTarget().details: Create and deploy the target contract (extension of Target contract), and sets the msg.sender as a researcher

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawPayments().details: withdraw accumulated balance, called by payee.
